The reproductive structure of angiosperm plants, consisting of stamens and carpels surrounded by petals and sepals all borne on the receptacle.

Love is a word which refers to a variety of different emotional states, feelings or attitudes which range from those of simple personal pleasures or desires to those characterizing interpersonal affection and many forms of profound kindness, compassion, and benevolent concern for the good of others.

description:
A red rose. Depicted as a single, vertical red rose on a green stem.

Commonly used for Valentine’s Day, Mother’s Day, and other special occasions. May be more generally used to express such sentiments as love and romance. Also used as a symbol of socialism or as a red accent color.

Not to be confused with ðŸŒ· Tulip, though their applications may overlap.

Samsung’s rose was previously pink.
apple_vendor_description: The rose emoji on Apple devices unfurls with a velvety, deep crimson petal, rendered with exquisite 3D shading and soft, rounded edges that hint at its delicate texture. Realistic lighting casts subtle shadows, enhancing its natural beauty and lush form, a hallmark of Appleâ€™s refined emoji aesthetic. This iconic symbol of love and romance is frequently used on Apple devices to convey deep affection, admiration, or even a touch of elegance in digital conversations.
